content: Hi All, I have query related to USCDI 2019 version 1 document, according to which, use of SNOMED codes will be mandatory for Problems (Conditions, diagnosis etc). So, will it impact Billing Systems as well (because they use ICD codes for diagnosis). Does the rule apply on them as well?
My understanding is "no" - it applies to exposing data to patients, not to billing
@Lloyd McKenzie Thank you very much for clarifying my doubt.
